segments.speaker: SPEAKER_01
segments.text: Hello everyone, I just got back from New York and it was amazing.

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_02
segments.text: That sounds great! I'm planning a trip to London next month.

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_03
segments.text: I love London! I've also been to Paris and Tokyo recently.

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_01
segments.text: I've never been to Tokyo, but I hear it's incredible. What about Sydney?

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_02
segments.text: Sydney is beautiful! The beaches there are amazing.
